ImageItem.internal_link_text: A browser window displaying the hello world page on Azure
A browser window displaying the hello world page on Azure

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: $ sudo apt-get install python-setuptools $ sudo easy_install django
from django.conf.urls import patterns, url urlpatterns = patterns('', url(r'^$', 'helloworld.views.home', name='home'), )
